tier_1_determinative.dishonest_intention: The accused entered the house of the complainant and committed robbery, indicating a dishonest intention.
tier_1_determinative.moving_movable_property: Gold ornaments worth Rs.9,37,500/- were taken away, indicating movement of movable property.
tier_1_determinative.in_building_tent_or_vessel: The theft occurred in the house of the complainant, which is a place used for human dwelling.

tier_3_contextual.incident_location: The theft occurred in the house of the complainant in Mumbai.
tier_3_contextual.incident_date_time: The FIR was registered on 7th October 2020.

tier_4_procedural.case_title: Chaggansingh Udaysing Parmar vs. The State of Maharashtra
tier_4_procedural.court_name: High Court of Judicature at Bombay
tier_4_procedural.judges_coram: PRAKASH D. NAIK AND N.R. BORKAR, JJ.
tier_4_procedural.counsel_for_appellant: Mr. Manish N. Jain with Ritu G. Gehlot, Nidhi G. Kherodiya, and Prasad D. Mundhe i/by S.M. Jain Associates

residual_details.additional_facts: Accused Aslam Israel Shaikh @ Qureshi was arrested on 13th March 2021. Chaggansingh Parmar was arrested on 13th March 2021 and later granted bail on 23rd March 2021. The applicant was allegedly the receiver of stolen property, but there was no cogent evidence against him.
